DOC.brief_title: Comparison Lens Care Regimens With Silicone Hydrogel Lens ( Emerald )
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate compare , daily wear basis , performance two contact lens care solution use silicone hydrogel soft contact lenses regard comfort dryness symptom observe change within cornea collect subjective rating
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : 1 . Is least 17 year age full legal capacity volunteer . 2 . Has read , understood sign information consent letter . 3 . Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule . 4 . Is presently use either biweekly monthly replacement lens . 5 . Has symptom ocular dryness determine specific prescreening criterion . 6 . Is correctable visual acuity 6/9 better ( eye ) habitual vision correction . 7 . Has clear cornea active ocular disease . 8 . Has ocular examination last two year . A person exclude study he/she : 1 . Is asymptomatic lens wearer . 2 . Is daily disposable contact lens wearer . 3 . Is current extended wear contact lens wearer . 4 . Currently use one study lens care regimen . 5 . Has clinically significant blepharitis . 6 . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . 7 . Is aphakic . 8 . Has active ocular disease . 9 . Has systemic disease affect ocular health . 10 . Is use systemic topical medication may affect ocular health . 11 . Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study . 12 . Is participate type clinical research study .
